author: metachris_
content:
rbuilder is failing to compute a blob related parameter correctly, seeing this kind of error:

```
simulation failed: invalid excess blob gas: got 82878256, expected 83053018; parent excess blob gas: 82747184, parent blob gas used: 917504
```

Testing a fix right now.

author: barnabasbusa
content: rbuilder is failing to compute a blob

author: metachris_
content: Updating the reth dependency in rbuilder helps. Investigating another issue, with the database. Should have resolved everything shortly.
